subject: Trades (Sports)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: The Red Bulls have traded midfielder Joel Lindpere, who had 15 goals and 18 assists in 97 appearances, to the Chicago Fire for a 2013 international roster spot.
snippet: The Red Bulls have traded midfielder Joel Lindpere, who had 15 goals and 18 assists in 97 appearances, to the Chicago Fire for a 2013 international roster spot.
